news_title: Above TRON and Cardano, Analyst Says PCHAIN Is the Best Altcoin for a $100,000 Boost to Your Portfolio in 2024
news_content: Last week’s surge led adherents to believe the so-called ‘Uptober’ rally had finally arrived. The overall crypto market soared 9%. However, Tron (TRX) and Cardano (ADA) struggled to keep pace, sliding between 1% and 3.4%. This prompted Cardano and Tron holders to look towards PropiChain’s native token, PCHAIN, during the presale. As Tron and Cardano falter, some buy the dip, hoping to make outsized gains when the blue-chip assets regain lost ground. An analyst also claims PCHAIN is the soundest altcoin due to its potential for 800% gains after launch. This predicted surge could boost many portfolios by $100,000 in 2024. PropiChain will use AI, the metaverse, and blockchain to transform the real estate industry. Join thePCHAIN token presaletoday to enjoy the benefits of using emerging technologies in this field. Tron was among the biggest performers in the last quarter, as its market cap surged from $10.9 billion to $13.5 billion in Q3. This marked a 24% growth driven by the SunPump meme coin activity. This milestone achievement helped Tron’s revenue to reach a new all-time high of $151.2 million. Cardano fell 1% in the past week, costing $0.351. In the past 24 hours, Cardano rose 1.5%, giving hope that a new rally is on the horizon. This is because the number of Cardano whales has recently increased by more than 10%. This increase in Cardano whales has yet to boost ADA’s price. An analyst predicts a Cardano surge in 2025, with a potential run to $0.5. PCHAINis increasingly becoming the best altcoin in 2024 due to its presale momentum and solid fundamentals. PropiChain has attracted whales due to its nearly guaranteed potential to transform the $300 trillion real estate industry. The upcoming project will use a set of emerging, high-value technologies to bring innovation into the real estate market. One of these technologies is the metaverse. The metaverse will be used for virtual staging, allowing potential buyers and tenants to experiment with different layouts. Users can explore properties in the metaverse, allowing them to make more informed decisions even if they are miles away from the physical properties. This expands market reach and works well for international buyers and sellers. The PCHAIN token will fuel the PropiChain ecosystem. Along with the metaverse, PropiChain will make use of AI. Users can employ AI for market analysis, allowing them to make strategic acquisitions. PropiChain gives prospective holders invaluable insights into the current and future real estate market by analyzing vast amounts of data and identifying emerging trends. This AI-driven market analysis makes PCHAIN the best altcoin in 2024. PropiChain will shine on transparency and security due to the underpinning blockchain technology. PropiChain will reduce the risk of fraud by recording every transaction on the blockchain. PropiChain will transform the $300 trillion real estate industry using emerging technologies, namely AI, blockchain, NFTs, and the metaverse. PCHAIN, the native token of the PropiChain ecosystem, will have several utilities, including paying for transactions on the platform. Analysts have lauded PCHAIN as a hidden crypto gem.
